DOC.HEADLINE: ENERGY CONTAINER OF SANTA ANA PURCHASED BY CANADIAN FIRM
DOC.TEXT: Derlan Industries Ltd . said it has agreed to buy Energy Container Corp. , a closely held Santa Ana company that makes fuel tanks for aircraft . No purchase_price was disclosed . Energy Container employs 105 people and has annual sales of about $ 16 million . The company also makes valves for the petrochemical industry . In connection with the acquisition , " Derlan will consolidate three of its California operations , together with Energy Container , into one large plant , " Derlan said . The other three plants are located within a roughly 20-mile radius of the Energy Container plant , said Michael Forsayeth , vice_president and chief financial_officer of Toronto-based Derlan . The closing of the three plants will result in a small charge , " but we don ' t expect it ' s going_to cost a ton of money , " Forsayeth said . He declined to be more specific .
